Title: Object: The Flight into Egypt
Description: The Virgin riding a donkey, carrying the infant Jesus, accompanied by St Joseph who walks alongside with a staff and bundle on his back, gesturing to left and looking back at them;p in a mountainous landscape with trees to right; in an oval frame. 1800 Hand-coloured mezzotint with etching
Bibliographic references: Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Russell 1926 / English Mezzotint Portraits and their states: Catalogue of Corrections of and Additions to Chaloner Smith's "British Mezzotinto Portraits" (undescribed)
Funder name: With contribution from: National Heritage Memorial Fund
With contribution from: British Museum Friends
With contribution from: Friends of Prints and Drawings
With contribution from: Mrs Charles Wrightsman
With contribution from: Michael Marks Charitable Trust
Acquisition notes: Acquired with the assistance of the National Heritage Memorial Fund, the Friends of the British Museum, the Art Fund, Mrs Charles Wrightsman, the Michael Marks Charitable Trust, and numerous individual donors.
